title: "John Howard promised to listen on Indigenous recognition, says Noel Pearson"
excerpt: "Cape York leader Noel Pearson has told how John Howard committed to listen to arguments for substantial constitutional recognition of Indigenous Australians beyond a mention in the preamble during a private conversation in the months before he lost his seat and the Coalition lost government."
